types.name: Order
types.description: Order object with the attributes text and rating

types.name: Shop
types.description: Shop object with attributes name, description and imageUrl

types.name: Review
types.description: Review object with the attributes text and rating

types.name: Service
types.description: Service object with the attributes text and rating

types.name: ShopInput
types.description: The input of the shop without the identifier

types.name: ReviewInput
types.description: The input of the review without the identifier

types.name: OrderInput
types.description: The input of the order without the identifier

types.name: ServiceInput
types.description: The input of the service without the identifier

types.name: String
types.description: The String scalar type represents textual data, represented as UTF-8 character sequences

types.name: Boolean
types.description: The Boolean scalar type represents true or false

types.name: Float
types.description: The Float scalar type represents signed double-precision fractional values as specified by IEEE 754

types.name: Short
types.description: The Short scalar type represents a signed 16-bit numeric non-fractional value

types.name: Int
types.description: The Int scalar type represents a signed 32-bit numeric non-fractional value

types.name: Long
types.description: The Long scalar type represents a signed 64-bit numeric non-fractional value
